name: Ecig Quit Electronic Cigarettes
overview:
ECIG QUIT ELECTRONIC E CIGARETTES BURY

Helps Give Up Smoking Or A Healthy Alternative Ecig Quit is an online company retailing electronic cigarettes. Ecig Quit are a Bury based retailer and sell E-Cigarettes, Starter Kits, E-Liquids and E-cig accessories. The CE4 electronic cigarette is the best selling E-Cigarette in Europe. It is not intended to help you quit smoking completely, however there is evidence that it helps you to give up smoking. It is a healthy alternative choice for smoking a cigarette when you can’t smoke. So whether you are looking to quit smoking, cut down on smoking or want an alternative you can use indoors, this is the perfect option for you.

Bury BL8 1SN 0161 985 0000 www.ecigquit.co.uk
